Uses of Class
gui.view.InformationBox

Packages that use InformationBox
Package Description
exceptions
This package represents all the exceptions, which can be thrown in this game
gameboard.objects
This package deals with all the objects, with which you can move over the gameboard and which are needed to play this game.
gameboard.tiles
this package deals with the single tiles and their properties / functionalities on the gameboard
gui.controller
This package contains the controller classes like SceneController and MovingObjectController.
gui.model
This package contains classes for individualized buttons and text fields as well as a class that is responsible for the information shown on the GUI and a class that helps to load the images.
gui.view
This package contains the classes that implement the stage and the different scenes and panes.

    Constructors in exceptions with parameters of type InformationBox
    Constructor Description
    MovingException​(java.lang.String s, InformationBox informationBox)
    Constructor that sets the String of the parameter as text of the news tex field of the information box.
